Title: Directs the office of renewable energy to post a map on its website and create an informational tab containing certain information about proposed major renewable energy facility sites
Summary: Directs the office of renewable energy, in consultation with the public service commission, to post a map on its website containing certain information about proposed major renewable energy facility sites and create an informational tab that calculates the regional impacts of such proposed sites.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the executive law, in relation to directing the office of renewable energy siting, in consultation with the public service commission, to create a statewide map of all proposed major renewable energy facility sites and an informational tab that calculates regional impacts of such proposed sites
